title: The Anthony Cumia Show 2014-08-21 (MP4)
description:
Thursday, August 21, 2014

Anthony kicks off the show recapping the visit with East Side Dave yesterday and with Colin Quinn the day before, revisits the news regarding Ferguson, answers some phone calls, and shows us a video of an Indian kid with freakishly giant hands. Ant updates us on a Gavin McInnes article and the repercussions he caught from it, he take a few agreeing and opposing calls on the topic, plays some viral "ice bucket" challenge videos and then, ogles a new Jess Greenberg song. He wraps up the show talking about Belle Knox, a new video game you'll want to get in on, and takes a few more listener calls.
